channel.title: Nexus Team
channel.description:
Modeller: Rune-server&Moparscape: naseem142 Server Coder: Rune-server: jens19963 & Moparscape: Project Runescape Hoster/webdeveloper & gfx: Temka
[code]Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6JBl-OMXIuSmqlv8KCvG5g Twitter: https://twitter.com/NEXUS_Runescape Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rsnexus[/code]
Base: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/572572-project-runescape-1-1-release.html
Developement Blog (source) [code]22 January 2015 Frost Blade custom sword working on particles Beats by Dr.Dree custom helm Fixed Bronze,silver cmds in nexus panel Added achievements in task tab for admins 21 January 2015 ::randomeventon and ::randomeventoff command 20 January 2015 Fixed slayer requirement to kill dark beasts Crawling hand hitpoints&animations Achievement: Gnome Agility Cleaned Achievement interface 19 January 2015 Started Achievements Achievements in task tab New home Fixed entrance at clan citadel 18 January 2015 Added Diamond & Emerald donator ranks Diamond & Emerald donator crowns Nexus Panel 17 January 2015 Changed Donator->super donator->extreme donator to Bronze->Silver->Gold Attack option on To'Kash the Bloodchiller & Divine skinweaver Icy Bones animations&combat script Added crystal key chest[/code]
Development Blog (modeller) 17 January 2015: [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/Archsword_zps6b3a7c04.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/S52OEVT.png[/img]
Development Blog (websided) [code]19 January 2015: Bought vps (UK) 17 January 2015: Nexus Logo Donations Bought vps&web domain (US)[/code] More will be added soon dont hate yet
Media: [img]http://i.imgur.com/TGCNSc4.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/neYTqlY.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/bIDmrEU.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/22xuUqR.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/isLlfqq.jpg[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/x29q2qL.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/7nZQHHO.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/2uLGTDZ.png[/img]

item.title: Nexus Team
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

Modeller: Rune-server&Moparscape: naseem142
Server Coder: Rune-server: jens19963 & Moparscape: Project Runescape
Hoster/webdeveloper & gfx: Temka

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6JBl-OMXIuSmqlv8KCvG5g Twitter: https://twitter.com/NEXUS_Runescape Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rsnexus

Base: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/572572-project-runescape-1-1-release.html

Developement Blog (source)

22 January 2015 Frost Blade custom sword working on particles Beats by Dr.Dree custom helm Fixed Bronze,silver cmds in nexus panel Added achievements in task tab for admins 21 January 2015 ::randomeventon and ::randomeventoff command 20 January 2015 Fixed slayer requirement to kill dark beasts Crawling hand hitpoints&animations Achievement: Gnome Agility Cleaned Achievement interface 19 January 2015 Started Achievements Achievements in task tab New home Fixed entrance at clan citadel 18 January 2015 Added Diamond & Emerald donator ranks Diamond & Emerald donator crowns Nexus Panel 17 January 2015 Changed Donator->super donator->extreme donator to Bronze->Silver->Gold Attack option on To'Kash the Bloodchiller & Divine skinweaver Icy Bones animations&combat script Added crystal key chest

Development Blog (modeller)
17 January 2015:

Development Blog (websided)

19 January 2015: Bought vps (UK) 17 January 2015: Nexus Logo Donations Bought vps&web domain (US)
More will be added soon dont hate yet
